title: Ticket #1583: Add condor_stats tests
description:
There aren't any tests that when KEEP_POOL_HISTORY that the history is kept (in files at $(POOL_HISTORY_DIR)/viewhist*), or that condor_stats correctly retrieves them. We should add some tests for all of the various query types for condor_stats. This will require running a few jobs through the pool, including some that checkpoint. Such a test might have caught #1582, where the ckptsrvr stats have been broken for 6 years.

You can find documentation on the viewhist files and condor_stats at DetailsAboutCondorStats.
